title: Erhard Ahmann
text:
Erhard Ahmann (21 May 1941 – 14 December 2005) was a German <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> manager.
In 1972, he was the assistant manager of the <a href="West%20Germany%20national%20football%20team">West Germany national football team</a>. Later he most notably managed <a href="Arminia%20Bielefeld">Arminia Bielefeld</a> and <a href="Alemannia%20Aachen">Alemannia Aachen</a>.
